Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Cermak/Karlov
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted Eastbound via Cermak, Kostner, Ogden, Pulaski and Cermak due to street blockage near Cermak/Karlov.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted Eastbound via Cermak, Kostner, Ogden, Pulaski and Cermak due to street blockage near Cermak/Karlov.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
